scripts.start:lib:protoc-gen-worker: nodemon --watch packages/protoc-gen-worker/src --watch packages/protoc-gen-worker/test/proto -e ts,proto --exec 'npm run build:lib:protoc-gen-worker && npm run test:lib:protoc-gen-worker:generate && npm run test:lib:protoc-gen-worker:generate-grpc-web && echo "Done"'
scripts.build: run-s build:lib:common build:lib:core build:lib:worker build:lib:worker-client build:lib:protoc-gen-worker build:lib:well-known-types
scripts.build:lib:grpc-web-client: ng build grpc-web-client --prod && cpy LICENSE.md dist/grpc-web-client/
scripts.build:lib:well-known-types: ng build well-known-types --prod && cpy LICENSE.md dist/well-known-types/
scripts.test:lib: run-s test:lib:common test:lib:core test:lib:worker test:lib:worker-client test:lib:protoc-gen-worker
scripts.examples:backend: docker-compose -f examples/backend/docker-compose.yaml down && docker-compose -f examples/backend/docker-compose.yaml up --remove-orphans --build
scripts.examples:proto:generate-basic: mkdir -p examples/basic-example/src/proto && rm -rf examples/basic-example/src/proto/* && $(pwd)/node_modules/.bin/grpc_tools_node_protoc --plugin=protoc-gen-worker=$(pwd)/dist/protoc-gen-worker/main.js --ng_out=config=examples/basic-example/ngx-grpc.conf.js:examples/basic-example/src/proto -I examples/proto $(find examples/proto -iname "*.proto")
